subscription_flow.title: Direct Carrier Billing
subscription_flow.description: This is like Thailand example, we should Legal + Button to subscribe, when click to subscribe we redirect to url_dcb_redirect.

subscription_flow.title: Sms + Pin
subscription_flow.description: this is like UAE example, we should display Legal Info + textBox to enter the mobile number (this will execute URL url_pin_request) and then a textbox to enter the PIN that the users get, after the user clicks on check PIN, we should call to url_pin_check if we get OK we set the cookie and redirect user to /club/ of the page if not, we show message of error.

subscription_flow.title: Sms + Call2Action
subscription_flow.description: This is how Greece works, we should display Legal Info + textBox to enter the mobile number (this will execute URL url_call2action_request), after this action is done we will display a countdown timer with N minutes that waits to receive websocket confirmation of the action (as the example I game you), if we get the socket event with the call2action confirmation we set cookie and redirect user to /club/ content.
